data.description:
This experience* has been designed and developed by VRducation, an initiative of SimDesign VR Studio to empower vivential learning through the astonishing immersion and emotional involvement introduced by VR. 

This experience is one of many that cover diverse topics from a professional and academically accurate perspective, providing reliable data presented in a beautiful, intuitive and fun experience.

This time, prepare yourself to travel back in time to the Mesozoic Era. Watch the peaceful Puertasaurs, feel speed of the Utahraptors or gaze upon the majesty of the legendary Tyrannosaurs while discovering interesting features, habits and facts of all the different species you will find in your journey. 

Relive history today. 

Welcome to "Dinosaurs!"

* Best viewed on Samsung Galaxy S7 and above

changelog.change_log: - Some cosmetic tweaks and fixes we've been warned about by our users. Keep the feedback coming!
Both the dinosaurs and the narrator were kinda shy with all the hassle at launch. Some minor tweaks and they should be up to speed again. To the affected users, thanks for your patience.
UI tweaks and entitlement check updates to keep the dinosaurs happy and safe. They get easily startled by strangers.

We've done a lot of changes to the experience, improving many aspects of the narrative and the overall quality (the dinosaurs are pretty happy with this). These improvements include:
* New Virtual Interface: easy on the eyes, with a better feedback and with extra polish. *
The audio quality has been improved substantially.
* Revised narrative with some tweaks to  track to give more time to appreciate certain environments.
We hope you enjoy it!
Due to technical restrictions that would impact the overall quality of the experience, we have decided to drop support for Android versions before Android 6.
